files.help:
Supported by default, but old location will be used if it exists.

You can move the directories like this:
```bash
mkdir -p "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/calcurse
mkdir -p "$XDG_DATA_HOME"/calcurse
mv ~/.calcurse/___{apts,notes,todo} "$XDG_DATA_HOME"/calcurse
mv ~/.calcurse/___{conf,hooks,keys} "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/calcurse
rm -rv ~/.calcurse
```
